name: Family Case Manager
description: The Family Case Manager works with families with children ages 0-12, offering parenting workshops, enhanced visitation, family advocacy, and team-based decision-making support. Responsibilities include case management, providing school-age children with one-on-one mentorship, organizing workshops for children and teens, offering basic information and referrals, and conducting outreach to connect families with essential resources.

howToGetIt: Call the mainline or send email for more information.
